segments.text: Well , that's why you'r here.My source for big TV sets overcharged me on the last shipment , so I need someone new . I wanted to meet you to see if we can work together . I think
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , but before you agree , don't you need to know what you're agreeing to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess you're right.But like you said , you called me here to check me out . I've been doing the same .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ha , ha , ha ! That's fair.How did I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Quite good , actually . I'm pretty sure you're demanding , but fair and honest . I feel we can work together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , well , here's what I need from you . Are you ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I know you work for someone else , but as your client , please , we have to get this straight between us . I'm your client , not your company.As your client , I expect you to be square with me at all times . Can you do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good ! Do you have any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1
